verbose_text: We observed a reverse correlation between the mRNA expression levels of miR-204 and HMGA2 by performing Spearman 's correlation test, r = -0.5882 (P < 0.0001) (XREF_FIG C), which confirmed that downregulation of miR-204 expression was clearly linked with upregulation of HMGA2 expression at the level of transcription in CRC tissues.
